synopsis.text: He's unconventional, she's a conformist. When their worlds collide, an unlikely partnership forms, and the journey to self-discovery begins. Meet Yukari Hayasaka, a diligent high school student with her sights set on college. But her mundane life takes a turn when she encounters the enigmatic George Koizumi and his eccentric friends, a group of fashion design students at the prestigious Yazawa Art Academy. They want Yukari to be their model for their final project, but she's hesitant, fearing it will derail her academic plans. However, as she spends more time with the group, she finds herself drawn to their passion and determination to chase their dreams. Will Yukari find the courage to break free from societal expectations and follow her heart? And will a romance blossom between her and the charismatic George? Join Yukari on her journey of self-discovery and find out in Paradise Kiss.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
